alert.note: Alert for Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 04 at 4:33PM EDT until August 04 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of eastern New York, including the following county, Herkimer. * WHEN...Until 600 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 433 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Herkimer, Newport, Middleville, Poland, Fairfield, Norway, Old City, Countryman, Carey Corners, Kast Bridge, Eatonville, Minott Corners, Irish Settlement, Dillenbeck Corners, Beacon Light Corners, Farrel Corner, Kelhi Corners, Johnson Corners, Sheaf Corners and Goodell Corners. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
